com.jrefinery.chart
Class StandardLegend

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.jrefinery.chart.Legend
        |
        +--com.jrefinery.chart.StandardLegend
public class StandardLegend
extends Legend

A chart legend shows the names and visual representations of the series that are plotted in a chart. In the current implementation, the legend is shown to the right of the plot area. In future implementations, there is likely to more flexibility regarding the placement relative to the chart.
